```{r}
library()
```


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
alpha = 61
beta = 41
theta = seq(0, 1, by=0.001)

prior = 1.0
lik = dbeta(theta, alpha, beta)
post = prior * lik 

plot(theta, post, xlab = "Theta", ylab = "Posterior Density", type = "l")
```
